titleStmt.title: Romes ruin or A treatise of the certaine destruction of Rome and of Antichrist before the ende of the world Wherein is cleerely manifested out of the Holy Scriptures, conferred with the historie of the Papacie, that he hath but a short time. A worke published to strengthen the faith of such as suffer vnder him. By I.P.
titleStmt.author: I. P., fl. 1629.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
